entry.title: Germany Moves Another $28 Million in Bitcoin to Bitstamp, Coinbase
entry.summary: The German government moved 250 BTC each to the two crypto exchanges, with a further 500 BTC sent to an unidentified address.

entry.title: Japan's Metaplanet Scoops More Bitcoin Amid Sluggish Economic Growth
entry.summary: Publicly traded Metaplanet Inc. has bought an additional 42 Bitcoin, valued at $2.4 million, as Japan's economy faces significant headwinds.

entry.title: Bitcoin Dips Below $55,000 as 'Significant' Selling Expected in Months Ahead
entry.summary: Bitcoin dropped by 6% to $54,600 during weekend trading, despite recovering some of the losses incurred at the end of last week.

entry.title: This Week in Crypto Games: Bitcoin GTA 6 Rumors, Moonray Hits Epic Store, Telegram Tap-to-Earn Upgrade
entry.summary: Catch up on this week’s biggest crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest roundup.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Degens Bet on Biden’s Woes
entry.summary: Polymarket gamblers, BODEN hodlers, and KAMA maxis are betting untold millions on whether the president will drop out of the 2024 election.

entry.title: Pirate Nation CEO Predicts Thousands of Dedicated Crypto Game Blockchains
entry.summary: After using 64 databases to support Farmville, Pirate Nation maker Proof of Play's CEO expects similar scaling approaches with blockchains.

entry.title: What Are Tap-to-Earn Games? The Crypto Craze Taking Telegram by Storm
entry.summary: Tap-to-earn games on messaging app Telegram are capturing the attention of the masses. Here’s how players are earning towards token airdrops.

entry.title: ‘Hamster Kombat’ Telegram Game Airdrop: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Telegram’s hottest game is planning an airdrop via The Open Network (TON)—and Hamster Kombat has teased tips for yielding the best bag.

entry.title: How AI is Paving the Way to a Transhumanist Future
entry.summary: SingularityNET CEO Ben Goertzel discusses how artificial intelligence can help humans advance faster than ever before.

entry.title: This Week In Coins: Bitcoin’s Bad Week Sinks the Crypto Fleet
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum withered as Mt. Gox dominated the narrative, as political meme coins remain volatile.

entry.title: New AI Training Technique Is Drastically Faster, Says Google
entry.summary: The so-called JEST approach is up to 13 times faster and 10 times more efficient—which could mean lower energy demands.

entry.title: GameStop Stock Still Sinking, Now Down 23% Over Past Month
entry.summary: Where’s Roaring Kitty? GameStop (GME) just finished another week down as meme stock momentum continues to fade.

entry.title: Biden Flips Kamala: Crypto Markets Expect President to Be Nominee
entry.summary: Crypto bettors on the popular prediction market Polymarket again favor incumbent Joe Biden for the Democratic nomination. For now.

entry.title: Telegram CEO Calls Crypto Game Hamster Kombat World's 'Fastest-Growing Digital Service'
entry.summary: Pavel Durov, Telegram’s founder and CEO, also said that viral game Hamster Kombat has reached 239 million users ahead of its token launch.

entry.title: Why HV-MTL Ethereum Mechs Are Coming to Arena Shooter ‘Shatterline’
entry.summary: After acquiring the IP from Yuga Labs, Faraway is bringing HV-MTL and Legends of the Mara into other games—starting with this one.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler’s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.

entry.title: Multicoin to Match Up to $1 Million in Solana Donations to Pro-Crypto Candidates
entry.summary: The ten-day campaign will raise funds for a political action committee focused on the U.S. Senate.

entry.title: Andrew Tate Teases DADDY Meme Coin 'Global Tour' After Being Cleared to Travel
entry.summary: Andrew Tate is free to travel the EU as he awaits trail in Romania—and plans to use this time for a “global” tour around the DADDY meme coin.

entry.title: If Biden Drops Out, Is Crypto Villain Gary Gensler Out Too?
entry.summary: If Democrats force president Joe Biden to stop running or even resign, is crypto still stuck with his infamous SEC head, Gary Gensler?

entry.title: Bitcoin Exchange Hack Leads Surging Tally of Crypto Stolen in 2024: TRM Labs
entry.summary: TRM Labs says $1.38 billion in crypto assets have been stolen so far in 2024, double the tally from this time last year. Here's why.

entry.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: UPDATED: Nintendo says it's already thinking about how to avoid shortages with the Switch 2 launch. Here's everything you need to know.

entry.title: Nigerian Officials Claim Detained Binance Exec Is 'Fine' Amid Health Concerns
entry.summary: The family of Binance executive Tigran Gambaryan said that he is "suffering immensely" in detention—but Nigerian officials don't agree.

entry.title: German Politician Criticizes the Government's Bitcoin Sell-Off Strategy
entry.summary: She would rather see the government keep "Bitcoin in the state treasury, issuing Bitcoin bonds, or creating a favorable regulatory environment."

entry.title: Notcoin Drops 14% as Fresh Start Shows Signs of Unraveling
entry.summary: Viral Telegram game, Notcoin, has taken a major hit as its fresh start begins to reveal itself and the wider crypto industry sees a downturn.

entry.title: Bitcoin Could Face Volatility From US Payroll and Unemployment Reports—But Not Much, Say Analysts
entry.summary: "Employment and non-farm payroll data are more indicative of how strong the U.S. economy is despite the higher rates," said a BRN analyst.

entry.title: Why Isn't Germany Selling Its Seized Bitcoin at Auction?
entry.summary: "Institutions generally prefer to acquire clean Bitcoin," said Darren Franceschini, co-founder of Fideum.

entry.title: $17.8 Billion Bitcoin Is Still Sitting in These Government Wallets: Arkham
entry.summary: Data from Arkham shows that countries including Germany, the U.S. and the UK hold substantial amounts of Bitcoin.

entry.title: End of Germany, Mt. Gox Sales 'Likely' to Mark Bitcoin Bottom, Experts Say
entry.summary: Crypto is facing its toughest headwind in months, with an end of selling from Mt. Gox and Germany expected to mark a Bitcoin bottom.

entry.title: Bitcoin Slides to $55,000 as Liquidations Top $600 Million
entry.summary: Bitcoin has fallen to its lowest point since February, triggering a cascade of liquidations worth hundreds of millions of dollars.

entry.title: Mt. Gox Transfers $2.7 Billion in Bitcoin From Cold Storage Amid Market Rout
entry.summary: Mt. Gox has transferred $2.7 billion worth of Bitcoin to an unidentified wallet, further exacerbating concerns over declining crypto prices.

entry.title: Blocking AI Bots From Scraping Websites Gets Boost From Cloudflare
entry.summary: Along with adding an “easy button” to stop AI developers from training their models on web content, the security firm shared its findings on AI bot activity.

entry.title: UFC Star Launches Meme Coin, Falls to Zero in Minutes Amid Insider Trading Claims
entry.summary: Khamzat Chimaev’s SMASH token crashed to zero after he promoted it on Twitter—and he’s since deleted his tweets.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange KuCoin Adds 7.5% Tax for Nigeria Users, Citing 'Regulatory Update'
entry.summary: The tax applies to “all transaction types on KuCoin platform,” the exchange told Decrypt.

entry.title: Bitcoin Is Falling—How Low Will It Go?
entry.summary: We still haven’t hit the bottom, analysts say. But they also expect plenty of upside left before the end of the year.

entry.title: Novice Bitcoin Traders Are Selling the Dip, Data Shows
entry.summary: CryptoQuant analysts say newer holders seem unable to stomach the volatility, dumping $2.4 billion in BTC this week.

entry.title: Fake Iggy Azalea Token Buyers Await Refunds as Celeb Handler Sahil Appears to Cash Out
entry.summary: Celebrity crypto coin promoter Sahil Arora has started to move funds out of the presale wallet that raised over $380,000 in May. What happened to the airdrop?

entry.title: Justin Sun Offers to Buy $2 Billion in Bitcoin From Germany to 'Minimize' Market Impact
entry.summary: It's unclear just how serious Sun really is, as usual.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 151 - BTC TAPS THE 60K LINE
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 150 - BILLY TO A BILLY?
entry.summary: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 149 - LUCA NETZ LIVE!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality with SingularityNET CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel
entry.summary: Transhumanism is a philosophical and intellectual movement that advocates the enhancement of the human condition using technologies that can increase longevity, cognition, and well-being. In this interview, SingularityNET founder and CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel discusses his background in the transhumanist movement and how AI, and AGI will play a part.

entry.title: Vivendi Web3 Lead: 'There's No Ethical GenAI if You Don't Protect Content'
entry.summary: Fabien Aufrechter, VP of Web 3.0 at Vivendi, joined Rug Radio's Farokh aboard the Joker Odyssey at Cannes Lions to discuss the media group's plans for a global digital copyright, and how token-gated media will lead to the end of third-party cookies.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 148 - SOL ETF NARRATIVE DOMINATES
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Van Eck files for ETF. Bitwise hints at SOL ETF filing. SOL will get ETF, ADA & XRP won’t: GSR. SOL price may rise 8.9x with ETF: GSR. Coinbase & Stripe team up for onboarding. BTC miner sell pressure weakens. BTC activity drops to lowest level in 10 years. Steve Cohen shuts down crypto arm of hedge fund. Crypto unmentioned in Presidential debate. Kraken co-founder donates $1m to Trump. Bolivia lifts BTC ban. MegaLabs raises $20m, aims for 100k TPS.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 147 - THE BLAST FALLOUT
entry.summary: Crypto bounces, ETFs see another small net inflow. The US government sends 3940 BTC to exchanges. Spot ETH ETFs may be coming July 4th. Coinbase sues SEC over FOIA inquiries. Most ‘obvious & attractive’ buying opp possible. US man convicted of home invasions to steal BTC. Blast launches at $2.5bn FDV, disappoints many. ADA faces DDoS attacks with 200 transactions. Losses from deep fakes could hit $24bn in 2024. Miners face M&A boom on AI retrofitting. Marathon mines $16M KAS. Vitalik introduces ZK voting company Rarimo. Animoca Brands considers public listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 146 - IT'S BLAST DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs reverse 7-day outflow. Geverman government to sell $35m more BTC. SOL Blinks allows transactions from any website. Jupiter allows you to swap tokens from X. Helius allows SOL staking from X. Drift allows you to leverage trade from X. ETH supply increases for 73 days straight. ETF review going smoothly: Gensler. Expect $15bn net inflows for ETH ETF: Bitwise. VanEck to waive ETH ETF fee until 2025. UAE new regulations could limit stablecoins. Court convicts two men for crypto ‘securities fraud’. BTC ETFs to be approved by Morgan Stanley. Vanguard CEO calls BTC ‘a stable asset like gold’. Blast launches today, 16.5% as community airdrop. $2.9bn FDV for Blast on Aevo, others predict higher. Top Blast holders to see vesting over 6 months. Nubank to integrate Bitcoin Lightning Network. FTX creditors to vote on cash or crypto repayment.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 145 - WE SURVIVED!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Mika Shares How to Send and Receive Crypto Using Kraken Wallet
entry.summary: Join Rug Radio creator and crypto influencer Mika as she guides you through the process of sending and receiving cryptocurrency using the Kraken wallet.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 144 - A VERY RED DAY
entry.summary: BTC hits 6-week lows, $215m liquidations in fall. Mt Gox set to start BTC repayments in July. Fear & Greed index nears 2024 lows. Bitfinex whales’ long positioning rebounds. Open Interest rises as shorts grow, funding negative. BTC is economic immortality, going to $10m: Saylor. Moment of truth for BTC to rebound: Ansem. Expect $61-62k BTC to hold: Emperor BTC. SOL upgrade is big step-change: Raoul Pal. Expect slow melt-up from ETH ETF: DC Investor. MKR falls 11% as delegate gets phished. TON ecosystem sees phishing attacks spread.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 143 - CRYPTO TRENDS LOWER
entry.summary: Crypto sinks, ETFs see another $140m outflow. German government likely sells $195m more BTC. 100 day BTC break-out coming: Don Alt. SOL ETF applied for in Canada. Rumours SEC case vs Coinbase also dropped. Standard Chatered setup spot trading desk. ARB has record daily revenue on LayerZero claims. CFTC investigating Jump Crypto. FTM outperforms ahead of Sonic upgrade. Binance integrates USDT on TON. Onchain prediction market TVL continues to soar.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 142 - ETH LEADS THE RALLY
entry.summary: ETH continues to lead gains, SOL underperforms. BTC may rebound as Fed liquidity rips higher. ETH sees large amount of bullish call activity. LayerZero launches today, 25% unlock. Funding level the lowest in 3 months. German government sends 1000 BTC to exchanges. Stablecoins to become 10% of money: Circle CEO. Stabelcoin transfers up 16x in 4 years. BTC exchanges balances hit 3 year low. SOL again flips ETH for DEX volumes. Kraken reports $3m bug exploit found by CertiK. Debate about whether CertiK were whitehats. Jump Crypto gives $10m to crypto PAC. Binance launches HODLer airdrops. TipLink allows SOL transfers by email. ETHFI proposes 50% revenue for buybacks. JTO teases LSD backed stablecoin. JUP team proposes to reduce 30% of supply.

entry.title: This Robotics Company Aims to Solve a Labor Shortage in Manufacturing
entry.summary: GrayMatter Robotics Co-founder and CEO Ariyan Kabir explains the origin of the company, the need for artificial intelligence and robotics to offset a growing labor shortage, and takes Decrypt on a tour of its AI-powered facility.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 141 - SEC DROPS ETH PROBE
entry.summary: BTC: 65.4k (0%), ETH: 3545 (+3%), SOL: 139 (+2%). Top Gainers: LDO, BRETT, PEPE, AR. ETH & beta lead gains after SEC headline. SEC drops probe into ETH as a security. BTC ETFs see another $152m outflow. Pantera show $100m buying interest in ETH ETF. Pantera aims to raise new $1bn fund. Lack of staking won’t harm ETH ETF: 21 Shares. LayerZero airdrop coming June 20th. SEC concerns on USDC may delay Circle IPO. Hayes increasing PENDLE & DOGE positions. Fox News to build L2 with Polygon. EIGEN trades at $10bn pre-market. Drift & Ondo partner on RWAs. Commercial real estate coming on-chain: KPMG.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 140 - MARKETS DOWN BAD
entry.summary: BTC touches 1-month lows, dominance hits 56%. $500m of liquidations in fall, $146m ETF outflows. VanEck to launch first ETF in Australia. Coinbase to launch pre-market trading. 56% of Fortune 500 building in web3. Uphold to delist USDT in EU due to MiCA. TON flips DOGE in sell-off. Base DEX users now 2nd place after SOL. Ethena launches staking & restaking with Symbiotic. Lens aiming to raise $50m at $500m valuation. Two ‘crazy’ MATIC announcements coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 139 - WHATS THE NEXT META?
entry.summary: BTC again breaks $66k, dominance rises. Fear & Greed index hits 3 month low. Whales continue to be in accumulation mode. Miners 33 days into capitulation, average 41 days. Financial advisors not buying BTC yet: BlackRock. Crypto funds saw $600m outflows last week. ZKsync airdrop live, prices at $5bn FDV. ZKsync defend sybil measures. Low float, high FDV coins get hammered again. Tether launches product backed by Gold. Korean exchanges reviewing 600 coins for delisting. ETH ETF ‘sell the rumour, buy the news event’. BTC ETF basis buyers roughly 15% of demand. CVX bounces 100% after loan liquidation. TON sees fastest user growth in crypto history. APT may flip SOL in 1-3 years: Hayes. Crypto lifetime funding eclipses $100bn. SEC claims $876m Ripple fine still fair. Gensler could cost Biden election: Cuban.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 138 - MORE CELEB COINS!
entry.summary: Altcoins bleed out heavy, BTC dominance rises towards 60%. Miners continue to be large BTC sellers, whales accumulate. ETF inflows slow, hedge fund allocations point to basis trades. ETH ETFs approvals see little movement, coming 'in the summer’. Stocks continue to hit ATHs as CPI & PPI both come in soft. TON performs best in L1s, active wallets eclipse ETH. Andrew Tate joins celebrity memecoin meta, DADDY hits $350m. SOL DEX volumes eclipse ETH in memecoin frenzy. Curve founder defaults on CRV debt as DeFi coins tumble. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon to pay $4.5bn fine to SEC. BAMK hits $350m in Runes as it issues BTC stablecoin. Gaming tokens face huge sell-off, PRIME changes tokenomics.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 137 - CRYPTO DIPS FURTHER
entry.summary: Crypto falls after slightly hawkish Fed speech. BTC whales buy $1.4bn in 24hrs. Miners continue to be large sellers of BTC. BTC ETFs see $100m inflows. MicroStrategy to raise $500m to buy BTC. Egorov CRV debt positions begin to liquidate . Circle to support SOL for wallets. 4% of Turkey GDP used to buy stablecoins. QuantMatter say $11m stolen from OKX account. Biden to use Coinbase for crypto donations. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon set to pay $4.5bn fine. Franklin Templeton write report on SOL DePin. TON flips ETH for active addresses. Moonpay & Paypal integration goes live in EU & UK.
